section.heading: Information and liaison services.
section.text: The Executive Officer shall be responsible for —

para.text: collecting and compiling statistical information with respect to the volume and disposition of the work of the courts and the personnel of the courts;
printing and the distribution of court rules;
keeping the courts advised of pending legislative and executive actions relating to the courts;
serving as the public information officer of the courts; and
performing such other duties as may be assigned to the Executive Officer by the Joint Committee and the chief judges in their respective courts.
